fig.label: Figure 1

caption.p: Effects of aqueous and 80% methanol Thymus schimperi leaves extract on body weight.

fig.attrib: Notes: AE250: aqueous extract 250 mg/kg; AE500: aqueous extract 500 mg/kg; MEOH250: methanol extracts 250 mg/kg; MEOH500: methanol extracts 500 mg/kg; NS: 0.9% normal saline
Abbreviations: GL, glibenclamide; NC, normal control; DC, diabetic control.
